ValidationRule.errorConditionFormula: IF( AND( ISCHANGED(Coupon_Seller_Stage__c), ISPICKVAL(Coupon_Seller_Stage__c, "Sent for Approval"), (Contract_Language__c = "US"), OR(FLOOR(eBay_Co_fund_Max__c) < 1000, FLOOR(eBay_Co_fund_Max__c) > 500000) ), true, false )
ValidationRule.errorMessage: The co-fund max must be a min of $1000 to a maximum of $500K in order to submit for approval
